ACHIEVEMENTS
Honors & Awards
Issued by NASA · Oct 2023
1st Runner-Up title at the NASA Space Apps Challenge in Bangladesh 2023

Team Mohakorsho has achieved success, at the NASA Space Apps Challenge in Bangladesh 2023! It brings me joy to share that our outstanding team of five from the city of Khulna, Bangladesh has secured the position of 1st Runner Up. We are truly grateful, for this recognition as we persistently aim for excellence.

Team Mohakorsho achieved a remarkable position, ranking within the top 580 teams out of over 220,000 registrations spanning 185+ countries worldwide.

Issued by NASA · Oct 2024
2nd Runner-Up Award at the NASA Space Apps Challenge - Bangladesh 2024

Team AgroNova - a five-member group from Khulna - secured the 2nd Runner-Up award at the NASA Space Apps Challenge - Bangladesh 2024 and qualified as one of Bangladesh's Global Nominee teams advancing to the international judging for our AI-driven satellite-imagery platform, AgroNova, which delivers real-time crop health monitoring and predictive resource management.
